text:
="preserve">Graham Neil "Jock" Edwards (27 May 1955 – 6 April 2020) was a New Zealand cricketer. Between 1978 and 1981, he played played eight Test matches and six One Day Internationals for New Zealand. He also played for Central Districts. He was born in Nelson.
Edwards died on 6 April 2020, at the age of 64.
